original_title: Air Band or How I Hated Being Bobby Manelli's Blonde Headed Friend
overview: Friendship, Rivalry, and Rock-n-roll all set in the late 80's. Darren struggles to get out of the shadow of his very popular friend, Bobby Manelli, instead of only being known as 'his blonde headed friend'.  Director Darrell C. Hazelrig Writer Darrell C. Hazelrig Stars Brittaney BeddingfieldChristopher BellBobby Bowen
title: Air Band or How I Hated Being Bobby Manelli's Blonde Headed Friend
